Parameters.description: Parameters for the OPEN_CONTAINER operation. Opens a container entity with key validation, checking if the actor has the required key if the container is locked.

actorEntity.description: Entity ID of the actor opening the container

containerEntity.description: Entity ID of the container to open

result_variable.description: Optional variable name to store the operation result. Result includes {success: boolean, error?: string, contents?: string[], keyItemId?: string}
